recipes.label: Exhausted!
recipes.startdescription: This secret technique successfully repelled the German bombardment. They withdraw briefly, but you are utterly spent. [You used Inviolate Defence to defend against a tactical assault; recovery time is doubled.]

recipes.label: The enemy is launching an overwhelming tactical bombing!
recipes.startdescription: The earth trembles, soil showers down, viscera resonates with the bombardment. How shall we respond? [When this tactic triggers, it will cause heavy casualties to your forces, destroy installations, and terminate all objectives on the field, exhausting them.]

recipes.label: The enemy is launching an overwhelming tactical bombing!
recipes.startdescription: Smoke and dust slowly settle. Nothing intact remains here—only rubble and twisted metal as far as the eye can see.

recipes.label: Face the Fire!
recipes.startdescription: The battlefield returns to silence. This army has turned to ash in the flames.

recipes.label: Face the Fire
